pages.text: It's often hard to keep track of everything going on in my spells. I have to remember each and every iota on the stack, and the order they're in-- often I find myself making mistakes.$(br2)Fortunately, if I hold a $(item)Scrying Lens/$ in my other hand, I will be able to simply $(italic)see/$ the iotas on my stack-- a short description of each iota will be listed, top-to-bottom. How convenient!
$(italic)You must learn... to see what you are looking at./$
